WorkItem.Description:
It would be nice to get the cell value automatically when calling PHPExcel_Worksheet::getCell() or PHPExcel_Worksheet::getCellByColumnAndRow() without having to do PHPExcel_Worksheet::getCell::getValue(). Getting a cell value may be the most common action done on the cell so it would reduce some redundant calls. So a basic __toString() method could be added to the PHPExcel_Cell class which would simply return the non-formatted cell value, the same as calling PHPExcel_Worksheet::getCell::getValue().
Â 
I implemented this in my own copy of the package and I thought it would be nice for everyone to have.
WorkItem.Summary: Implementation of PHPExcel_Cell::__toString() for the cell value

Comments.Message: Magic method added to cell object to return getValue() result as a string
